plot outline: Krushna a kind hearten school bus driver who believes in helping people.One day he gets a random call from Meera also known as Tanvi who tells him that she has got kidnapped.Krushna takes the help of Inspector Baburao where they realize that Tanvi was joking.A series of phone call happens between the two where Krushna realizes that Tanvi wants to escape from her abusive father and both develop a good friendship thou haven't met each other.On the day of Krushna's wedding with Vrunda,Tanvi goes missing and Inspector Bahurao arrests Krushna leading to a situation Krishna's engagement to be called of with Vrunda and getting married to Tanvi.
title: Triple Seat
plot: A young, happy guy receives a call from an unknown woman who claims to be in danger. A new take on the classic love triangle, _Triple Seat_ (qv) brings to you a light-hearted story about wireless love.

Krushna a kind hearten school bus driver who believes in helping people.One day he gets a random call from Meera also known as Tanvi who tells him that she has got kidnapped.Krushna takes the help of Inspector Baburao where they realize that Tanvi was joking.A series of phone call happens between the two where Krushna realizes that Tanvi wants to escape from her abusive father and both develop a good friendship thou haven't met each other.On the day of Krushna's wedding with Vrunda,Tanvi goes missing and Inspector Bahurao arrests Krushna leading to a situation Krishna's engagement to be called of with Vrunda and getting married to Tanvi.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
